## ``hc_theme_handdrawn``
Hand Drawn theme for highcharts

#### Description 

Hand Drawn theme for highcharts. Inspirated by https://www.amcharts.com/inspiration/hand-drawn/

#### Usage

hc_theme_handdrawn(...)

#### Arguments 

*  ... Named argument to modify the theme

#### Examples
```{r}
highcharts_demo() %>%
hc_add_theme(hc_theme_handdrawn())
```
